attributes.action: Support DT - Ban Citizens of Countries with a Terrorism problem from the UK
attributes.additional_details: We need to follow the esteemed Donald Trump's lead  and bring in a similar ban in the UK to effectively prevent the UK from terrorism particularly the Trojan horse threat of terrorists from these countries posing as asylum seekers
attributes.background:
A lot of hyperbole has been written about Donald Trump's ban of citizens of several countries to protect the US from terrorism.

A lot of the misinformation in connection with this has been stirred up by the Left-wingers who have effectively labelled it a 'Moslem ban'. It isn't

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure how you would like the Government to define "countries with a terrorism problem" and so we're not sure which countries you think a ban should apply to. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
